Author: intertropical
Text: There are lots of factors that can control what you see on the scale, and it doesn’t mean that you’ve gained actual weight/fat – bc you can’t do that if you’re in a deficit. Have you eaten more salt or sugar, or exercised recently? Those can cause more water weight! If you menstruate and your period is coming soon, your weight could go up too. Or maybe you’re slightly constipated?   Don’t worry friend, it can’t be actual weight/fat and I’m sure it’ll go away. It doesn’t mean that you need to restrict lower – that might just lower your metabolism. Stay strong.
